headline.main: Saudi Aramco to List Locally and Abroad in Second Half of 2018-CEO
headline.print_headline: Saudi Aramco to List Locally and Abroad in Second Half of 2018-CEO

lead_paragraph: Oil giant Saudi Aramco will be listed locally and abroad in the second half of 2018, and the process is going according to plans, Chief Executive Amin Nasser said on Monday.
snippet: Oil giant Saudi Aramco will be listed locally and abroad in the second half of 2018, and the process is going according to plans, Chief Executive Amin Nasser said on Monday....
